title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 10
description: With Amnesty Lodge and its residents in peril, the Pine Guard sets out to plan their next hunt post-haste — but can they find the strength to do so without the guidance of their absent leader? Aubrey does some recon. Duck gets the hard questions. Ned goes for a drive.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
